item.title: My thoughts on Atomic Habits
item.description: Hi! Hello! Welcome to my first post on soft skills! If this is not the first time you’re on my blog, you know that as a software engineer, I’ve been mainly writing about technical topics, but I strongly believe that soft skills are just as important for success in any field as technical ones. In this post, I’ll share my thoughts on a book I recently read - Atomic Habits written by James Clear - and discuss how I’ve applied some of its ideas in my daily work, encouraging you to read and use such books as well!
